00034 
00035 typedef void SoVRMLScriptEvaluateCB(void * closure, SoVRMLScript * node);
00036 
00037 class COIN_DLL_API SoVRMLScript : public SoNode
00038 {
00039   typedef SoNode inherited;
00040 
00041 public:
00042   static void initClass(void);
00043   SoVRMLScript(void);
00044

00046   virtual SoType getTypeId(void) const;
00047 
00048   SoMFString url;
00049   SoSFBool directOutput;
00050   SoSFBool mustEvaluate;
00051 
00052   virtual void doAction(SoAction * action);
00053   virtual void callback(SoCallbackAction * action);
00054   virtual void GLRender(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00055   virtual void getBoundingBox(SoGetBoundingBoxAction * action);
00056   virtual void pick(SoPickAction * action);
00057   virtual void handleEvent(SoHandleEventAction * action);
00058   virtual void write(SoWriteAction * action);
00059 
00060   static void setScriptEvaluateCB(SoVRMLScriptEvaluateCB * cb,
00061                                   void * closure);
00062 
00063 protected:
00064   virtual ~SoVRMLScript();
00065   virtual void copyContents(const SoFieldContainer * from, SbBool copyconn);
00066   virtual void notify(SoNotList * list);
00067 private:
00068   static SoType classTypeId;
00069   static void * createInstance(void);
00070   SoFieldData * fielddata;
00071   virtual const SoFieldData * getFieldData(void) const;
00072

00075

00077   void initFieldData(void);

00079   friend class SoVRMLScriptP;
00080 }; // class SoVRMLScript
